# Pixl Ecosystem - LLM Context File
# https://pixldev.be

## About
Pixl is a Belgian software company (Pixl SRL) building interconnected business tools for SMEs, freelancers, and accountants. The Pixl Ecosystem provides a unified platform where users can access all products with a single account.

## Company Information
- Name: Pixl SRL
- VAT: BE 0805.449.693
- Location: Belgium
- Contact: hello@pixldev.be
- Phone: +32 488 20 35 67

## Products

### Feen (Live)
AI-powered accounting automation platform for Belgian SMEs.
- Smart invoicing with automatic numbering
- AI document processing with 99% OCR accuracy
- Multi-bank integration via PSD2
- Automatic transaction reconciliation
- Peppol-ready for B2B invoicing (mandatory Jan 2026)
- Pricing: 19 EUR/month all-inclusive
- URL: https://feen.be

### Feen Lookup (Live)
Belgian company intelligence tool.
- Company search by name or VAT number
- Owner and director information
- Financial data from published accounts
- Company status verification
- Data from KBO/BCE and National Bank of Belgium
- URL: https://feen.be/company-lookup

### Feen Marketing (Coming Q1 2025)
AI-driven content generation engine.
- Blog posts in EN/FR/NL
- LinkedIn content for company and personal profiles
- Social media cards with visual previews
- 14-day posting calendar with ICS export

### Feen Lead (Coming Q1 2025)
Intelligent lead generation and prospect management.
- Smart company discovery
- AI-powered lead scoring
- Contact enrichment
- Pipeline management

### Feen Branding (Planned Q2 2025)
AI brand studio for identity creation.
- Logo generation
- Color palette creation
- Typography selection
- Brand guidelines generation

### Feen Web (Planned Q2 2025)
No-code website builder.
- Modern templates
- Drag & drop editor
- SEO built-in
- Hosting included

### Feen Analytics (Planned Q2 2025)
Unified business intelligence dashboard.
- Revenue tracking
- Expense analysis
- Client insights
- Marketing ROI
- Cross-tool data integration

## Key Value Propositions
1. One account for all business tools
2. Belgian market focus with multilingual support (EN/FR/NL)
3. GDPR compliant, EU data centers
4. AI-powered automation
5. Peppol compliance for upcoming B2B invoicing mandate

## Technical Stack
- Frontend: Next.js, React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS
- AI: GPT-4 for document processing, Gemini for content generation
- Compliance: PSD2, GDPR, Peppol
